technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Placenta is isoechoic and normally located.
Major vessels show unremarkable waveform on Doppler.
Liver appears mildly heterogeneous with no focal lesions.
Common bile duct measures 18.85 mm, within normal limits.
Left kidney shows mildly heterogeneous, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Right kidney demonstrates homogeneous, no hydronephrosis.
